descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [DarkFlame] equal to [FreischutzShotCount] (once per turn for each unit)

data.desc:
Deal +1% damage for every 3 [Combustion] on target (max 10%)
[BeforeAttack] At 0 [FreischutzShotCount], gain 1 [FreischutzShotCount].
- [FreischutzShotCount] value determines the bullet to fire.
· [FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_1st]
· [FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_2nd]
· [FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_3rd]
· [FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_4th]
· [FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_5th]
· [FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_6th]
· [FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_7th]
[EndSkill] Gain [FreischutzShotCount] equal to the highest Reson. (min. 1, max 4)
[EndSkill] If the main target is defeated, inflict 2 [DarkFlame] against all enemies with [Combustion]

passiveList.desc:
- On Hit with Base Attack Skills: inflict ([FreischutzShotCount] / 3) [Combustion] (3 times per turn)
- For Lobotomy E.G.O::Magic Bullet[TabExplain] Outis Identity, inflict ([FreischutzShotCount]) [Combustion] instead (3 times per turn)
- If the target has 30+ [Combustion], inflict 1 [DarkFlame] instead of the above effect (2 times per turn)
passiveList.name: Seven Bullets
